data.title: Ellis County Lake Houses
data.meta_description: There are over 350 lake subdivisions around the lake. That is why it is important to use an experienced lake realtor.
data.text:
Ellis County is in the DFW metropolitan area of Texas. The county seat is in Waxahachie. Ellis county has 15 cities, 7 towns, and unincorporated areas. You will find peaceful neighborhoods, thriving towns and cities, business areas, countryside, and fun entertainment. Cities/Towns in Ellis County are Alma, Avalon, Bardwell, Bristol, Cedar Hill, Crisp, Ennis, Ferris, Forreston, Garrett, Glen Heights, Grand Prairie, Ikes, Italy, Mansfield, Maypearl, Midlothian, Milford, Oak Leaf, Ovilla, Palmer, Pecan Hill, Red Oak, Rankin, Telico, Venus and Waxahachie. Ennis is well known for their Bluebonnet Trail and annual festival. Bluebonnets are the state flower of Texas and the area display is splendid. Waxahachie is well know for the annual Scarborough Renaissance Festival. For those who like car racing, the Texas Motorplex is the place to visit.

Bardwell Lake is 4 miles southwest of Ennis in Ellis County. Surface area: 3,138 acres, maximum depth 43 feet, impounded 1965. The conservation pool elevation is 421 feet above mean sea level. Fluctuation is about 4 feet. The water authority is U S Army Corp of Engineers. The lake is in Ellis County and offers fishing, boating, and camping.

Joe Pool Lake is 7,470 acres, 60 miles of shoreline, and the maximum depth is 75 feet. Joe Pool lake is located. It is owned and operated by US Army Corp of Engineers. The lake is in Grand Prairie & Cedar Hill in Dallas, Ellis & Tarrant counties. You cannot live right on the water nor can you own a boathouse. You can picnic, camp, boat, jetski, waterski and fish on the lake.
